articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola said Ajax Amsterdam manager Erik ten Hag could be a strong candidate to succeed him.
articles.content:
Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola has said Ajax manager Erik ten Hag could be a strong candidate to succeed him.
Ten Hag is also among a handful of names linked to the top job at Manchester Unit… [+1438 chars]

articles.title: Getting to grips with Rashid Khan | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Afghanistan's globe-trotting spin sensation reveals how he makes use of his different bowling grips, which one works best in Mumbai, and more in an exclusive interview

articles.author: Neelav Chakravarti
articles.title: "Used To Be Made To Sit At Home": Mohammad Kaif Criticises KKR's Treatment Of Indian Spinner - NDTV Sports
articles.description: IPL 2022: Mohammad Kaif lashed out at KKR for their treatment of Kuldeep Yadav, saying he is a bit "emotional" and needs to be "managed well".
articles.content: Having not played a single game during IPL 2021, Kuldeep Yadav was released by Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) after their campaign ended with a defeat to Chennai Super Kings (CSK) in the final. The spin… [+1360 chars]
